title: Ep 402 | Why Jase Struggled to Make Friends in High School & Willie Cannot Cook Using a Recipe
description:
Al and Jase discuss Willie's incessant need to add ingredients to any recipe he uses. Phil and Al talk about Miss Kay's birthday and the one time Phil went shopping to buy her a gift. Jase explains how Si's complaining about the placement of decoys almost ruined their no-arguing streak. Jase and Al look at the past year and how rapidly their family is expanding. Jase describes why he was lonely in high school and how his friends turned on him due to his faith. Jase and Phil discuss why you get two ears and one mouth. And Phil points out the parallels between cancel culture and what is seen in Matthew 26.

Read the first chapter of "Uncanceled" by Phil Robertson now: https://philrobertson.substack.com/p/uncanceled-chapter-one
The ONLY place to get "Your Daily Phil" by Phil Robertson in time to start off your new year: https://talkshop.live/watch/QID3D1y77yHJ 
-
